channel.title: General Phones Mobile Femtocell Developing Nations on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Phones Mobile Femtocell Developing Nations on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Musings about femtocells: the futures!
item.description: I wrote most of this entry the day before the earthquake in Haiti. It was motivated by the magicJack announcement and my interest in mobile devices within developing nations. However, the thoughts in this post suddenly seemed more real after I started hearing reports of communication breakdown after the earthquake. The femtocell At the recent CES, the magicJack company announced that they wanted to release a consumer grade FemtoCell device as an upgrade to their USB FXO/Softphone device.
